sentence: Figure 1 represents the prevalence of limitations in men and women in those with weakness, depending on the definition used.
Mean walking speed was uniformly lower in those with weakness, irrespective of the FNIH definition, sex, ethnicity and age (Figure 2 and Appendix 1).
